headline.main: After the Storm, a Hunger for Tradition
headline.print_headline: After the Storm, a Hunger for Tradition

docs.snippet: I'm normally not much of a meal planner but I know what I'm going to have for lunch one week from Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: I'm normally not much of a meal planner but I know what I'm going to have for lunch one week from Monday.

headline.main: Abandoned Chicago Railway Reborn as Commuter Corridor
headline.print_headline: Abandoned Chicago Railway Reborn as Commuter Corridor

docs.snippet: On an abandoned Chicago railway line cutting between the treetops, bike commuters zip by walkers and joggers, all traversing a ribbon of concrete undulating through a lush landscape where clattering freight cars once ferried everything from coal t...
docs.lead_paragraph: On an abandoned Chicago railway line cutting between the treetops, bike commuters zip by walkers and joggers, all traversing a ribbon of concrete undulating through a lush landscape where clattering freight cars once ferried everything from coal to furniture.

headline.main: Kovacs Wins Shot Put Gold Ahead of Germany's Storl
headline.print_headline: Kovacs Wins Shot Put Gold Ahead of Germany's Storl

docs.snippet: American Joe Kovacs won the men's shot put gold medal at the world athletics championships in Beijing's Bird's Nest Stadium on Sunday, denying defending champion David Storl of Germany a hat-trick of titles....
docs.lead_paragraph: American Joe Kovacs won the men's shot put gold medal at the world athletics championships in Beijing's Bird's Nest Stadium on Sunday, denying defending champion David Storl of Germany a hat-trick of titles.

headline.main: Junior Miners Jump Into Medical Marijuana, Food Service Amid Slump
headline.print_headline: Junior Miners Jump Into Medical Marijuana, Food Service Amid Slump

docs.snippet: Many of the world's junior miners are laying down their picks and shovels to start new ventures ranging from egg exporting to medical marijuana farming, as they as try to survive a crash in metals prices by shifting away from exploration....
docs.lead_paragraph: Many of the world's junior miners are laying down their picks and shovels to start new ventures ranging from egg exporting to medical marijuana farming, as they as try to survive a crash in metals prices by shifting away from exploration.

headline.main: 2 Lawyers Banned From Detention Center, Deepens Dispute
headline.print_headline: 2 Lawyers Banned From Detention Center, Deepens Dispute

docs.snippet: Attorney Kim Hunter received a letter earlier this month from immigration authorities telling her she'd been banned from a family detention center in South Texas for being "belligerent" in demanding the release of her clients one late July night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Attorney Kim Hunter received a letter earlier this month from immigration authorities telling her she'd been banned from a family detention center in South Texas for being "belligerent" in demanding the release of her clients one late July night.

headline.main: Activists: Islamic State Destroys Temple at Syria's Palmyra
headline.print_headline: Activists: Islamic State Destroys Temple at Syria's Palmyra

docs.snippet: Islamic State militants have destroyed a temple at Syria's ancient ruins of Palmyra, activists said Sunday, realizing the worst fears archaeologists had for the 2,000-year-old Roman-era city after the extremists seized it and beheaded a local scho...
docs.lead_paragraph: Islamic State militants have destroyed a temple at Syria's ancient ruins of Palmyra, activists said Sunday, realizing the worst fears archaeologists had for the 2,000-year-old Roman-era city after the extremists seized it and beheaded a local scholar.

headline.main: North Dakota Drone Test Site Set to Fly High at All Hours
headline.print_headline: North Dakota Drone Test Site Set to Fly High at All Hours

docs.snippet: Of the six sites in the U.S. where researchers are trying to figure out how to integrate unmanned aircraft into civilian airspace, only North Dakota's can fly high both day and night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Of the six sites in the U.S. where researchers are trying to figure out how to integrate unmanned aircraft into civilian airspace, only North Dakota's can fly high both day and night.

headline.main: Carson Says Wants Drones to Blast Caves, Not People at U.S.-Mexico Border
headline.print_headline: Carson Says Wants Drones to Blast Caves, Not People at U.S.-Mexico Border

docs.snippet: Republican presidential candidate Ben Carson on Sunday called for using drones to beef up surveillance along the U.S.-Mexico border and destroy caves used by those who smuggle people and drugs, but said he did not support strikes aimed at people....
docs.lead_paragraph: Republican presidential candidate Ben Carson on Sunday called for using drones to beef up surveillance along the U.S.-Mexico border and destroy caves used by those who smuggle people and drugs, but said he did not support strikes aimed at people.

headline.main: Israel Names Interim Anti-Monopoly Czar After Leviathan Dispute
headline.print_headline: Israel Names Interim Anti-Monopoly Czar After Leviathan Dispute

docs.snippet: Israeli Economy Minister Aryeh Deri named Uri Schwartz as acting commissioner of the anti-trust authority to temporarily replace David Gilo, who is stepping down at the end of the month....
docs.lead_paragraph: Israeli Economy Minister Aryeh Deri named Uri Schwartz as acting commissioner of the anti-trust authority to temporarily replace David Gilo, who is stepping down at the end of the month.

headline.main: Pint-Size Thieves Frighten Ivory Coast's Largest City
headline.print_headline: Pint-Size Thieves Frighten Ivory Coast's Largest City

docs.snippet: Ivory Coast taxi driver Mamadou Bamba had finished his shift and was walking home around midnight when a dozen children accosted him on the street and demanded his money. When he hesitated, the thieves pulled out small knives and stabbed him eight...
docs.lead_paragraph: Ivory Coast taxi driver Mamadou Bamba had finished his shift and was walking home around midnight when a dozen children accosted him on the street and demanded his money. When he hesitated, the thieves pulled out small knives and stabbed him eight times before making off with fares totaling more than $100.
